_sText:
Welcome to Fight Yard Taboo! This secret Prodigy training yard was buried amongst the endless tunnels and passage ways beep in the Prodigy military compound. Due to the small size and relatively close contact with the enemy a sharp eye and lightning fast reaction is needed to survive, everyone must constantly be on the move with very few places to camp this training yard will test your skills and your endurance! You will be dropped into Fight Yard Taboo with only your side arms, scattered around the yard are 7 HE nads. Hold on to these and make good use of them. If you chose to offer your participants alternative weapons let the noobs have there sniper rifles they’ll probably never get to use them! ;) -------------------------------------- Any way blah blah, foo bar… This map was created and intended to be run with CS:S DM (http://www.bailopan.net/cssdm/) How ever being a Beta release this offers me and the larger community to decide if weapons should be dropped into the map like normal "FY" maps or if buy zones should be added or leave it alone. I am open to any constructive criticism that improves this maps playability, I know CS:S DM is popular but not on every servers so if weapons are desirable please chime in! I can't get bzip2 to do it's thing right now vista has gone crazy so no .bz2 file right now, at 3.54Mb this map is small but a .bz2 does come in handy! I'll include this when I release a final map but most should know how to make it! -------------------------------------- Installing is simple copy or move fy_taboo_beta.bsp and fy_taboo_beta.nav to your map folder, normally found at: C:\Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\STEAM_ID\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps -------------------------------------- Project page: http://www.fpsbanana.com/studios/projects/view/20680 Enjoy! Jason, AKA GrayTap, The Black Llama
